thread.section_title: Hotel Canada, BW Premier Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Choice
thread.title_full: Great Choice - Review of Hotel Canada, BW Premier Collection, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Radhika B
title: Great Choice
text:
We checked in to a beautiful lobby.Checkin ws quick and efficient. The rooms are clean and quipped to all needs. The staff is very friendly and helpful. A special thanks to Nicole fr all the info and help. Breakfast is like any other hotel...but more that enough to sustain a long morning. The location of the place is just perfect.
Convenient, Helpful staff, well equipped clean rooms and the cutest lift ....this would perfectly summarise our fabulous stay at tis hotel.
